title.narrative: Capacity Building for Responsible Minerals Trade (CBRMT)

description.narrative: The Capacity Building for Responsible Minerals Trade (CBRMT) project goal is to strengthen the capacity of the DRC and regional institutions to transparently regulate and control a critical mass of the trade in strategic minerals in eastern DRC in order to transform the regions mineral wealth into economic growth and development.
